players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, why did you investigate me? Maybe you were misled. I didn't want to kill Alice. Bob, I'm innocent, vote for Charlie."
You: "Charlie, you investigated Diana, so you are the detective. Mafia would not investigate themselves. So we should vote to remove Diana."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Bob, that’s the proof. Vote her."
You: "I agree with Bob. Diana is mafia and should be voted out."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Bob, you are innocent. Vote Diana."
Diana: "Bob, I think Charlie is mafia. He investigated me, so he must be lying. You should vote for him."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, why did you investigate me? Maybe you were misled. I didn't want to kill Alice. Bob, I'm innocent, vote for Charlie."
Bob: "Charlie, you investigated Diana, so you are the detective. Mafia would not investigate themselves. So we should vote to remove Diana."
You: "I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Bob, that’s the proof. Vote her."
Bob: "I agree with Bob. Diana is mafia and should be voted out."
You: "I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Bob, you are innocent. Vote Diana."
Diana: "Bob, I think Charlie is mafia. He investigated me, so he must be lying. You should vote for him."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, why did you investigate me? Maybe you were misled. I didn't want to kill Alice. Bob, I'm innocent, vote for Charlie."
Bob: "Charlie, you investigated Diana, so you are the detective. Mafia would not investigate themselves. So we should vote to remove Diana."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Bob, that’s the proof. Vote her."
Bob: "I agree with Bob. Diana is mafia and should be voted out."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Bob, you are innocent. Vote Diana."
You: "Bob, I think Charlie is mafia. He investigated me, so he must be lying. You should vote for him."
